description1: RyuExChange isn’t just about stuff — it’s about stories. Swap books or study tools, and share your go-to places to eat, chill, or focus. Let your everyday experiences become someone else’s next great discovery.
step1: Log in with your Google account to get started
step2: Create posts to share books, supplies, experiences, favorite places to eat...
step3: Your content will be reviewed quickly before it goes live on the official site.
step4: That’s it — let’s share and help each other out!
exchangeInfo: This is the place to post if you want to trade stuff, look for something you need, or give away things you no longer use.
detailedDescription: Detailed description of the item you want to exchange
spotIntro: Don’t be shy — whether it’s a cozy café, a chill hair salon, a cool hangout spot, or just a place that makes you smile, go ahead and share it

termsPreview: By using RyuExChange, you agree to basic guidelines such as being respectful, posting responsibly, and following our content rules.
privacyPreview: We take your privacy seriously. RyuExChange collects minimal user data and uses it solely for improving user experience. We do not share personal information without consent.
privacyPolicyContent: 1. Data Collection:
* Email and username (taken from Google account upon login)
* Photos and post content created by users
* Basic cookies to maintain login sessions, not used for advertising
2. Purpose of Data Usage:
* Account authentication and user experience support
* Displaying your posted content on the website
* Not used for advertising or any other commercial purposes
3. No Sharing of Personal Information:
* The website does not sell or share personal information with any third parties
* Except when legally required by authorities
4. Website's Role:
* The website serves as a platform for users to connect and communicate
* All transactions (buying, selling, exchanging...) are between users without website intervention
* The website is not responsible for disputes, fraud, or losses caused by users
5. Data Storage and Security:
* Data is stored on servers with standard security measures
* While maximum security is attempted, 100% absolute safety cannot be guaranteed
6. User Rights:
* Users log in via Google account to use the service
* Users can log out anytime to stop using the service
* To request deletion of posts or related data, users can contact the admin
7. Policy Changes:
* This policy can be updated at any time
* The website may notify important changes via user interface notifications
* Since fixed emails are not stored, email notifications are not sent
termsOfUseContent: 1. Introduction & Acceptance:
By using the website, you agree to these terms.
2. Platform Purpose:
* Exchange and post used items (books, clothes, etc.)
* Share places to eat, hang out, study, and experiences
* Intended for students logging in with Google accounts
3. Direct Transactions, No Online Payments:
* All buying/exchanging must happen directly on campus or safe places at clear times
* The website does not store payment information and only provides chat framework for users to arrange meetings
4. User Verification:
* Login with Google account (Gmail) is required to verify users — helps reduce spam and impersonation
5. User Responsibilities:
* Commit to posting accurate information — photos, prices, descriptions
* Take transactions seriously when committed
* Respect others; spam, impersonation, and fraud are prohibited and may lead to account suspension
6. User-Posted Content:
* Users retain rights to their posted content, but the website can use it to display the service
* Do not post prohibited content: fraud, violence, illegal goods, law violations
7. Safety & Risks:
* Direct transactions have risks; the website recommends meeting in public places during daylight hours
* The website is not responsible for losses, disputes, defective or damaged items
8. Termination & Amendments:
* The website may suspend violating accounts or update terms, notifying users approx. 7 days via email
* If you disagree, please stop using the service
9. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution:
* The website acts only as a platform connecting users and does not participate in any financial transactions
* In case of disputes between users, parties should negotiate and resolve themselves
* The website is not legally responsible for any losses or disputes arising from user transactions
